alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Milwaukee; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued May 26 at 2:16PM CDT until May 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 2 to 5 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Beaches along Lake Michigan in Milwaukee, Racine, and Kenosha counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include Atwater Beach in Village of Shorewood... Mckinley Beach in Milwaukee... Bender Beach in Oak Creek... North Beach in Racine... Wind Point Lighthouse Beach in Racine... Simmons Island Beach in Kenosha...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
